\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	\color{rgb,255:red,20;green,44;blue,255}{\vdots } \& {\vdots } \& {\vdots } \& {\vdots } \\
	\color{rgb,255:red,20;green,44;blue,255}{(X,I^2)} \& {(P^{-1},I^2)} \& {(P^{-1},I^2)} \& {(P^{-2},I^2)} \& {\cdots } \\
	\color{rgb,255:red,20;green,44;blue,255}{(X,I^1)} \& {(P^{-1},I^1)} \& {(P^{-1},I^1)} \& {(P^{-2},I^1)} \& {\cdots } \\
	\color{rgb,255:red,20;green,44;blue,255}{(X,I^0)} \& {(P^{-1},I^0)} \& {(P^{-1},I^0)} \& {(P^{-2},I^0)} \& {\cdots } \\
	\color{rgb,255:red,108;green,0;blue,240}{(X,Y)} \& \color{rgb,255:red,230;green,0;blue,11}{(P^{0},Y)} \& \color{rgb,255:red,230;green,0;blue,11}{(P^{-1},Y)} \& \color{rgb,255:red,230;green,0;blue,11}{(P^{-2},Y)} \& \color{rgb,255:red,230;green,0;blue,11}{\cdots }
	\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,20;green,44;blue,255}, from=2-1, to=1-1]
	\arrow[dashed, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=1-2]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=2-3, to=1-3]
	\arrow[from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow[from=2-4, to=1-4]
	\arrow[from=2-4, to=2-5]
	\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,20;green,44;blue,255}, from=3-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow[dashed, from=3-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow[from=3-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow[from=3-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow[from=3-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=3-3, to=3-4]
	\arrow[from=3-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow[from=3-4, to=3-5]
	\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,20;green,44;blue,255}, from=4-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow[dashed, from=4-1, to=4-2]
	\arrow[from=4-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow[from=4-2, to=4-3]
	\arrow[from=4-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow[from=4-3, to=4-4]
	\arrow[from=4-4, to=3-4]
	\arrow[from=4-4, to=4-5]
	\arrow[dotted, from=5-1, to=4-1]
	\arrow[dotted, from=5-1, to=5-2]
	\arrow[dashed, from=5-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,230;green,0;blue,11}, from=5-2, to=5-3]
	\arrow[dashed, from=5-3, to=4-3]
	\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,230;green,0;blue,11}, from=5-3, to=5-4]
	\arrow[dashed, from=5-4, to=4-4]
	\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,230;green,0;blue,11}, from=5-4, to=5-5]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
